name: Dry Brushland
description: Semi-arid terrain with scattered shrubs and hardy grasses creates a challenging environment for travel and settlement. The limited water sources restrict agriculture, while the hardy vegetation provides some forage for livestock and wildlife.
atmosphere: Hardy shrubs and scattered cacti dot the arid landscape while cracked earth shows the scarcity of water. Wind-blown sand and brittle vegetation create harsh conditions as small creatures shelter in whatever shade exists. The air carries sage, dust, and survival challenges.
